title: Five-Star Thailand Pool Villa Retreat near Phang Nga with Four Restaurants & Spa Village
description: Ultimate island fantasy becomes tropical paradise reality at the opulent Six Senses Yao Noi, found on golden sands embraced by the gleaming turquoise seascape of the mighty Phang Nga Bay. Perched between Phuket and Krabi, this five-star escape aims to redefine exceptional experiences, offering total privacy amongst 24 acres of lush landscaping and natural vegetation. 56 breathtaking villas are dotted throughout the picturesque paradise, each with a private pool, glorious views of Koh Yao Noi’s famous natural surroundings and the signature unparalleled service and hospitality that is Six Senses’ foundation.
offer_address: 56 Ko Yao Noi, Ko Yao District, Phang-nga 82160, Thailand
